original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme …pe…
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme pe
gandhabba kāyike vaḥ bhikkhave deve desessāmi
katamā ca bhikkhave gandhabba kāyikāḥ devā
santi bhikkhave mūla gandhe adhivatthāḥ devā
santi bhikkhave pheggu gandhe adhivatthāḥ devāḥ
santi bhikkhave papaṭika gandhe adhivatthāḥ devāḥ
santi bhikkhave patta gandhe adhivatthāḥ devāḥ
santi bhikkhave puppha gandhe adhivatthāḥ devāḥ
santi bhikkhave phala gandhe adhivatthāḥ devāḥ
santi bhikkhave rasa gandhe adhivatthāḥ devāḥ
santi bhikkhave gandha gandhe adhivatthāḥ devāḥ
ime vuccanti bhikkhave gandhabba kāyikāḥ devā ti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā gandhabbakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bhante hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yena midhekaccaḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā gandhabba kāyikānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati iti

original: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhu ekaccaḥ kāyena su caritam carati vācāya su caritam carati manasā su caritam carati
gandhabba kāyikāḥ devāḥ dīgha āyukāḥ vaṇṇavantaḥ sukha bahulāḥ ati

original: ‘aho vatāhaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā gandhabbakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjeyyan’ti.
analyzed: aho vata aham kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā gandhabba kāyikānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjeyyanti

original: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā gandhabbakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: saḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā gandhabba kāyikānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati

original: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā gandhabbakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam kho bhikkhu hetu ayam paccayaḥ yena midhā ekaccaḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā gandhabba kāyikānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati iti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā mūlagandhe adhivatthānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti?
